text:
Skating rink, VR park...
Karaoke, billiards, and bowling...

A whole day's worth...
It seems like we can all play together...

Yeah yeah~
Next time, let's all come to play on our day off!

Great idea.
If it's for a private visit, what would Kogane choose?

They all seem fun, so it's hard to decide...
I guess something everyone can enjoy together would be best~

As everyone already knows,
Karaoke or bowling!

Hehe... If we all play together...
Even something new will surely be enjoyable...

Kiriko's right...
Since we're here, might as well try out various things, Sakuya~!
